title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Gather requirements from stakeholders, analyze business needs, and document them. This task involves conducting interviews with key stakeholders (including potential users, system administrators, and other relevant parties), reviewing existing documentation, identifying key performance indicators (KPIs) for the system, and prioritizing those KPIs based on their impact on system performance, scalability, and fault tolerance. The gathered requirements will be used to inform the design, implementation, and testing phases of the GlobalScaleLoadBalancer project.

title: Design Architecture for GlobalScaleLoadBalancer
description: Develop the overall system architecture that addresses latency, capacity, and fault tolerance requirements.

title: Design Load Balancer Algorithm
description: Develop the algorithm for intelligent traffic distribution considering latency, capacity, and fault tolerance.

title: Develop Data Center Connectivity Module
description: Implement the module to connect data centers and ensure seamless traffic flow.

title: Develop User Interface for Load Balancer Management
description: Create a user-friendly interface to manage and monitor the load balancing system.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Create a scalable database design to store and manage load balancing data.

title: Deploy Load Balancer to Test Environment
description: Setup the load balancing system in a test environment and configure necessary resources.
dependencies: Develop User Interface for Load Balancer Management

title: Test GlobalScaleLoadBalancer in Test Environment
description: Perform functional, integration, and performance testing to ensure the load balancing system works as intended.
dependencies: Deploy Load Balancer to Test Environment

title: Address Test Findings and Iterate
description: Fix any identified issues or inefficiencies based on testing results, and iterate until the system passes tests.

title: Deploy Load Balancer to Production
description: Setup the load balancing system in a production environment and configure necessary resources.

title: Monitor GlobalScaleLoadBalancer in Production
description: Set up monitoring and alerting mechanisms to ensure smooth operation of the load balancing system.
